sentences.en: A grasp of mundane affairs is genuine knowledge; an understanding of worldly wisdom is true learning.
sentences.cn: 世事洞明皆学问, 人情练达即文章.

sentences.en: A paint finish can transform something everyday and mundane into something more elaborate.
sentences.cn: 油漆罩面能够使普通而平凡的东西看上去更加精致。

sentences.en: Be willing to do even mundane tasks.
sentences.cn: 即使平凡的工作也乐意承担。

sentences.en: Bridging the divine and mundane, shape shifting, divine gifts, personal growth.
sentences.cn: 联结神与世界, 转换形态, 神的礼物, 个人成长.

sentences.en: Her London life was sedate, almost mundane.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦的生活平淡无奇，几乎有些枯燥。

sentences.en: I found the job very mundane.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这工作非常单调.

sentences.en: I love the way a good flirtation can enliven the most mundane situation.
sentences.cn: 恰到好处的打情骂俏能够使最平淡无奇的时刻变得生动有趣起来，我很喜欢这种感觉。

sentences.en: Initially, the work was pretty mundane.
sentences.cn: 刚开始，这工作非常乏味。

sentences.en: It was hard to return to mundane matters after such excitement.
sentences.cn: 经验过这种紧张的情形,很难再回来做例行的事务.

sentences.en: It's an attitude that turns the mundane into some-thing rather more interesting and exciting.
sentences.cn: 这种态度会将平淡的事情变得更加有趣而令人激动。

sentences.en: Other mundane factors also affect how phones are used.
sentences.cn: 还有一些一般性问题也影响着人们使用电话的方式.

sentences.en: Our minds are taken up with far more mundane things.
sentences.cn: 我们的头脑充满了现实的问题.

sentences.en: Peace comes through rising above the mundane and seeing the larger picture.
sentences.cn: 超越世俗、看到更宽广的图景,藉此和平就会到来.

sentences.en: The " pure'scientist often assumes that the application of knowledge is mundane.
sentences.cn: 有些从事于 “ 纯理论 ” 学科的科学家常常傲慢地把应用科学问题贬低为世俗的雕虫小技.

sentences.en: The mundane task of setting the table can be fun on holidays.
sentences.cn: 摆放餐具这种无趣的事情在假日里也会变得有意思起来。

sentences.en: Yes, airing a quilt can also be so dirty, mundane and unromantic.
sentences.cn: 是的, 晒被也可以如此肮脏琐碎毫不浪漫.

sentences.en: Your work is just going to be mundane triviality.
sentences.cn: 大多是一些平凡而琐碎的工作,但平凡里含着伟大,琐碎中常有创新.

words.tran_cn: 世俗的，平凡的；世界的，宇宙的

trans.tran_cn: 平凡的，宇宙的，寻常的，世俗的
trans.tran_en: ordinary and not interesting or exciting
